title: FOR SALE T210 Old Mill Rogers SERIES 8 PSA 3
author: tbob

posts.post_title: FOR SALE T210 Old Mill Rogers SERIES 8 PSA 3
posts.post_content:
I accidentally picked this up on ebay when I actually owned one. My mistake is your gain. I dropped the selling price to $90.00 and I'll pick up the shipping. First come first serve. I think T210s now on ebay are going to be scarce and especially the very tough final series (8th). Clean back too. SOLD.
[url]trophybob@sbcglobal.net[/url]
Bob M.
